name: Treant
description: A massive living tree that serves as the heavy infantry of the Fae Court. Slow but incredibly durable with devastating melee attacks.

abilities.name: Siege Attack
abilities.description: Attacks deal bonus damage to buildings.

abilities.name: Nature's Armor
abilities.description: High natural armor from thick bark.

abilities.name: Entangling Roots
abilities.description: Summons roots to immobilize an enemy.
